entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
